meanings.definition: To hit someone on the head with a thrown object.
meanings.sent1: He beaned his friend with a ball during the game.
meanings.sent2: The baseball player beaned the opponent with a fast pitch.
meanings.sent3: The dodgeball game turned serious when he beaned his teammate accidentally.
meanings.sent4: Her aim was so good that she beaned the target every time.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ball being beaned echoed in the gym.

meanings.sent1: The boxer beaned his opponent with a powerful punch.
meanings.sent2: She beaned the nail into the wall with a hammer.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally beaned the waiter with a flying tomato.
meanings.sent4: The storm beaned the coast with strong winds and heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The hammer beaned the metal, creating a loud clang.

meanings.definition: To be struck on the head.
meanings.sent1: He beaned himself on the head with the low-hanging branch.
meanings.sent2: The baseball player got beaned by the ball during the game.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy pirate often beaned himself with the ship's boom.
meanings.sent4: The falling coconut beaned him on the head unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected rockfall beaned the hiker on the head.
